Call for Reservation
2.2.1 Jhinga Achari
Tiger prawn cooked with fresh tomatoes in medium sauce, nigela and fenugreek seed used to give rich flavour. A popular dish amongst our customers.
2.2.2 Khan Stuffed Chicken
Whole pieces of chicken breast stuffed with mixed vegetable and grilled in the tandoori than cooked in medium thick sauce to give mouth watering taste.
2.2.3 Butter Chicken
Chicken tikka cooked with butter, garlic, fenugreek leaf clustered suger garnished with raw cashew nut
2.2.4 Goul Bhoulta
Bangladeshi fish cooked with garlic, ginger and mixture of fresh herbs
2.2.5 Lebu Goast
Lamb cooked with chillies, lemon peel, ginger, garlic and lime juice.
2.2.6 Murgh-a-Bahar
2.2.7 Sha Kothi Chicken
Chicken cooked with coconut, mustard, black pepper, red chillies and ginger.
2.2.8 Lamb or Chicken Tikka Masala

Chicken or lamb grilled in a charcoal clay oven then marinated in mild spices & herbs, cooked in specially prepared, delicately flavoured creamy sauce. Can be served medium or hot according to your choice.
Mild and creamy dish with sliced mango, coconut and almond.
2.2.11 Shimla Mirchi
Chicken or lamb tikka cooked with mushroom and potato in a fairly hot sauce.
2.2.12 King Prawn Tikka Masala
King prawns barbequed in charcoal oven and cooked in rich delicately flavoured sauce.
Lamb or chicken tikka garnished with nuts, almonds cooked in a creamy sauce.
2.2.13 Lamb or Chicken Tikka Pasanda
Small pieces of chicken spiced and cooked with exotic spices and herbs, fresh green chilli, onions, tomatoes and green peppers.
Mint flavor ice Cream mixed with milky Chocolate pieces topped with attractive Decoration.
Real Vanilla ice cream with honey Sauce and nuts with glazed almonds.
An exclusive ceramic pot with highly luxurious rich saffron and pistachio flavored ice cream Topped with nuts.
Frozen strawberry yoghurt rippled with strawberry sauce, decorated with wild blackberry in a glass bowl.
Mango ice cream rippled with passion fruit and garnished with papaya chunks served in a attractive Chinese bowl.
King prawn pieces marinated in exotic spices and herbs, fresh green chilli, onions, tomatoes and green peppers
Tender cubes of lamb or chicken tikka marinated in fresh herbs and exotic spices, cooked in butter, coconut and almonds. Mild.
King prawn marinated in herbs and selected spices and mastered sauce grilled in charcoal clay oven then cooked in frying pan with home made aubergine pickle.
Chicken tikka marinated with garlic sauce and cooked with garlic butter and fresh garlic.
Sour and spicy yoghurt sauce, aromatic mixed spices, garnished with lime pickle, lemon juice and tamarind.
Tender spring chicken marinated in herbs and selected spices, grilled in a charcoal clay oven.
Diced lamb or chicken pieces marinated in spices and grilled in charcoal clay oven.
Salmon marinated in tandoori spices then grilled over charcoal.
Barbequed king prawn pieces marinated in spices and herbs, grilled with onion, tomato and green.
Chicken tikka, lamb tikka, tandoori chicken & sheek kebab grilled in clay oven, served with nan.
Chicken Tikka, Sheek Kebab, Chicken Korma, Lamb Korai, Vegetable Curry, Bombay Potato, Plain Rice, Pulao Rice, Nan Bread.
Chicken Tikka, Sheek Kebab, Onion Bhaji, Chicken Tikka Masala, Lamb Korai, Prawn Saag, Vegetable Curry, Saag Aloo, Mushroom Bhaji, 2 Pulao Rice, Nan Bread.

Chicken Tikka, Sheek Kebab, Onion Bhaji, Samosa, Chicken Korma, Lamb Jalfrezi, Prawn Saag, Chicken Tikka Masala, Mushroom Bhaji, Saag Bhaji, Tarka Dall, Bombay Potato, 2 Plain Rice, 2 Pulao Rice, Nan, Garlic Nan, Peshawari Nan.
Stuffed with chicken tikka, garlic and coriander.
Tender cubes of king prawn grilled in clay oven, then cooked with yoghurt in fresh herbs and exotic spices, cooked in butter, coconut and almonds. Mild and creamy.
Slice lamb or chicken tikka cooked with mince meat, yoghurt, exotic medium spices, special made sauce, served sizzling in an iron dish.
